other_tests.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis at the lung bases. There are two heterogenously hypodense liver lesions, one in segment VII measuring 3.5 x 3.5 cm and second near confluence of the portal vein, measuring 1.8 x 1.8. There are scattered diverticula in the colon. There is a segment of the sigmoid colon with marked wall thickening and adjacent mild fat stranding. There is a 4 x 3 cm hypodense lesion in the left adnexa. No free air or drainable collection is seen.
